Sentence.sentence: A surprising thing for the man who runs one of the world's most powerful economies to say? Perhaps; though in the run-up to the five-year review of the Millennium ( ' ,  千年的) Goals, he is far from alone.

Sentence.sentence: The way I see it, our banks now have a greater obligation to the goal of a wider recovery, he said.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"目标，目的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: aim, goal, purpose, end, target, object, objective
means: aim ：从本义"靶子"引申而来，侧重比较具体而明确的目标，但常指短期目标。
goal ：指经过考虑和选择，需经坚持不懈的努力奋斗才能达到的最终目标。
purpose ：普通用词，既指以坚决、审慎的行动去达到的目的，又指心中渴望要实际的目标。
end ：指心目中怀着的某种目的，强调结果而非过程。较正式用词。
target ：指射击的靶，军事攻击目标。引申指被攻击、批评或潮笑的目标。
object ：强调个人或需求而决定的目标、目的。
objective ：与object基本同义，但语义更广泛，指具体或很快能达到的目的，也可指军事目标。书面用词。

entry.def: In games such as football, netball or hockey, the goal is the space into which the players try to get the ball in order to score a point for their team.
entry.tran: （足球、无板篮球或曲棍球等的）球门

example.ex: David Seaman was back in the Arsenal goal after breaking a knuckle.
example.tran: 戴维·西曼在一个指关节骨折后又回到阿森纳队的球门前。

entry.def: In games such as football or hockey, a goal is when a player gets the ball into the goal, or the point that is scored by doing this.
entry.tran: （足球或曲棍球赛等的）进球，进球得分

example.ex: They scored five goals in the first half of the match...
example.tran: 他们在上半场比赛中攻入了5球。

example.ex: The scorer of the winning goal.
example.tran: 打进制胜一球的得分手

entry.def: Something that is your goal is something that you hope to achieve, especially when much time and effort will be needed.

example.ex: It's a matter of setting your own goals and following them.
example.tran: 这就需要设立自己的目标并为之努力。

example.ex: The goal is to raise as much money as possible.
example.tran: 目的是筹集到尽可能多的资金。

means.word_mean: 1. the state of affairs that a plan is intended to achieve and that (when achieved) terminates behavior intended to achieve it;

sentences.sentence: "the winning goal came with less than a minute left to play"

means.word_mean: 3. game equipment consisting of the place toward which players of a game try to advance a ball or puck in order to score points
4. the place designated as the end (as of a race or journey);

sentences.sentence: "he was nearly exhuasted as their destination came into view"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'limit, boundary'): of unknown origin

sentences.cn: 为了把观点阐释清楚,她继续说:“越来越明显的是,目的的缺失以及政府、媒体或企业中道德语言的缺失可能会成为资本主义与自由最危险的目标之一。”
sentences.en: Driving her point home, she continued: “It’s increasingly apparent that the absence of purpose, of a moral language within government, media or business could become one of the most dangerous goals for capitalism and freedom.”

sentences.cn: 有助于我们实现目标形象的最佳提升方式又是什么？【句子解析】本句是一个复合句。主句是一个特殊疑问句，由“特殊疑问句（what) +系动词（is) +表语（the best way)”构成;动词不定式短to pull off one作后置定语，修饰way。That引导的定语从句，修饰one;从句中，that代替先行词one作主语，谓语是enhances,宾语是our goals。句首的And表示顺接。
sentences.en: And what’s the best way to pull off one that enhances our goals?

sentences.cn: 对于一些人而言，他们可能会更加注重目标，即提升自己的职业形象。【句子解析】本句是一个简单句，其主语是the goal，系动词是may be,and连接并列的表语:动词不定式短语to be taken more seriously 和（to) enhance their professional image。介词短语 For one person 作状语。
sentences.en: For one person, the goal may be to be taken more seriously and enhance their professional image.

sentences.cn: 寻求专业人士的支持，并与他们分享你的目标和处境。【句子解析】本句是一个由and连接的并列句。分句一是一个祈使句，由“谓语（Enlist) +宾语（the support)”构成;介词短语of professionals作后置定语，修饰the support。分句二也是一个祈使句，由“谓语（share) +宾语（your goals and context) ”构成；介词短语with them作状语。
sentences.en: Enlist the support of professionals and share with them your goals and context.

sentences.cn: 瑞丁邀请各企业参与实现“女性在董亊会中占40%”这一性别平衡目标。
sentences.en: Reding invited corporations to sign up for gender balance goals of 40 percent female board membership.

sentences.cn: 那时的用语有目标,有策略,有目的,但不谈活力,不论激情。”
sentences.en: There were goals, there were strategies, there were  objectives, but we didn’t talk about energy; we  didn’t talk about passion.”

sentences.cn: 间时，美国鱼类及野生动植物管琍局(USWS)还设立了一个临时目标，即在接下来的十年中，将草 原榛热的数设恢复至年均6.7万只。
sentences.en: USFWS also set an interim goal of restoring prairie chicken populations to an annual average of 67,000 birds over the next 10 years

sentences.cn: 将时间看作一种需要最大化的资源意味着你将其视为工具,只有当某一特定时刻能够推动某一目标的进程时，你才觉得过得有价值。
